subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With a 4-2 victory in the best-of-seven series, the Buffalo Sabres advanced to the second round for the first time since 2001, which was also the last time it was in the playoffs.
snippet: With a 4-2 victory in the best-of-seven series, the Buffalo Sabres advanced to the second round for the first time since 2001, which was also the last time it was in the playoffs.
